pr_title: [NETBEANS-4503] Code completion does not work in functions declared inside methods

timeline.message:
[NETBEANS-4503] Code completion does not work in functions declared inside methods

Nested functions are in a Method/FunctionScope.
However, they are added as elements of a NamespaceScope.
i.e. Method/FunctionScope doesn't have nested FunctionScopes. NamespaceScope has them.
So, (not return the child result simply,) check whether the child result contains the parent result in the `VariableScopeFinder.findWrapper()`.

timeline.author: tmysik

replies.bodyText: Ha, it is running in just one thread, right? In such a case, not needed, of course.
replies.author: tmysik

replies.bodyText: Oops, will change it to your suggestion :)
replies.author: junichi11

replies.bodyText: If it is running in only one thread (as here I guess, in the parsing thread) then AtomicBoolean is just a holder for a boolean. So, using compareAndSet() is IMHO not necessary.
replies.author: tmysik

replies.bodyText: I seem to misunderstand something. Sorry... I'll revert it if I modify this class in the future. Thank you for your review :)
replies.author: junichi11

replies.bodyText: No problem, my fault because of my misleading/confusing comment.
replies.author: tmysik

timeline.author: tmysik

timeline.message: Find a VariableScope again if an unscanned scope is scanned
Find a VariableScope again if an unscanned scope is scanned
